MetaNeatGenome
public
MetaNeatGenome​<T>
where T : struct

NeatGenome metadata.  Genome related values/settings that are consistent across all genomes for the lifetime of an evolutionary algorithm run.

Type Parameter
T

Neural net numeric data type.

Properties
InputNodeCount
public int InputNodeCount { get }

Input node count.

OutputNodeCount
public int OutputNodeCount { get }

Output node count.

IsAcyclic
public bool IsAcyclic { get }

Indicates if the genomes that are evolved are acyclic, i.e. they should have no recurrent/cyclic connection paths.

CyclesPerActivation
public int CyclesPerActivation { get }

For cyclic neural networks (i.e. if IsAcyclic = false) this defines how many timesteps to run the neural net per call to Activate().

ActivationFn
public IActivationFunction<T> ActivationFn { get }

The neuron activation function to use in evolved networks. NEAT uses the same activation function at each node.

ConnectionWeightScale
public double ConnectionWeightScale { get }

Maximum connection weight scale/magnitude.  E.g. a value of 5 defines a weight range of -5 to 5.  The weight range is strictly enforced, e.g. when creating new connections and mutating existing ones.

InputOutputNodeCount
public int InputOutputNodeCount { get }

The total number of input and output nodes.

Functions

CreateAcyclic

int inputNodeCount,
int outputNodeCount,
IActivationFunction<T> activationFn,
double connectionWeightScale =  5.0
)

Create a new instance of MetaNeatGenome{T}, with IsAcyclic set to true, i.e., for evolving acyclic neural networks.

Input node count.

Create a new instance of MetaNeatGenome{T}, with IsAcyclic set to false, i.e., for evolving cyclic neural networks.

int

Input node count.

For cyclic neural networks (i.e. if IsAcyclic = false) this defines how many timesteps to run the neural net per call to Activate().

IActivationFunction<T>

The neuron activation function to use in evolved networks. NEAT uses the same activation function at each node.
